record.description: Phoebe Jacobus, Mary Ellison, Dorothea Smith, and Kathryn Wiedenhoeft of the University of Chicago rehearsing roles in "What Ho!" the annual revue of the university woman’s dramatic organization, Mirror, [which will be] presented the evenings of February 27 and 28 in Mandel hall. Previously revues have been staged without the [participation] of male students. This year men have been admitted to the cast, and the girls grudgingly admit that the affair ought to be better than ever.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
